original_title: It's Enough to Make a Grown Man Cry
overview: With his unique, hilarious style, Ken Davis takes a look at the clues around the shortest verse in the Bible to give us a new perspective on why Jesus wept. But he doesn't stop there. Ken's view: "If you know what makes God cry, then you know how to make him dance!" This wonderfully entertaining message is filled with hope and encouragement for believers of all ages.
title: It's Enough to Make a Grown Man Cry
